name: User Added to Local Administrators
description: This rule triggers on user accounts that are added to the local Administrators group, which could be legitimate activity or a sign of privilege escalation activity
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND ((winlog.provider_name:/[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\-[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy]\-[Aa][Uu][Dd][Ii][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg]/ AND event.code:4732) AND (winlog.event_data.TargetUserName:/[Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn][Ii][Ss][Tt][Rr].*/ OR winlog.event_data.TargetSid:/[Ss]\-1\-5\-32\-544/)) AND (NOT (user.name:/.*$/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND ((winlog.provider_name:Microsoft\-Windows\-Security\-Auditing AND event.code:4732) AND (winlog.event_data.TargetUserName:Administr* OR winlog.event_data.TargetSid:S\-1\-5\-32\-544)) AND (NOT (user.name:*$)))`
